description.add: Configure a new forwarding channel for your New API deployment.
description.edit: Update channel settings and routing information.

validation.baseUrlRequired: Base URL is required for this channel type.

type.label: Channel Type
type.hint: Choose the upstream provider that this channel will forward to.

key.label: API Key
key.placeholder: Enter the upstream provider API key

models.label: Available Models
models.hint: Type to search or press Enter to add a custom model name.

groups.label: Channel Groups
groups.hint: Groups are sourced from your configured New API site.

priority.label: Priority
priority.hint: Channels with lower priority numbers are used before others.

weight.label: Weight
weight.hint: Controls load balancing within the same priority (0 = equal distribution).
